Name: Word of Kitchen
About the game: This is a word search game. Theme: kitchen. You are presented with several letters and your task is to add words from these letters. The task is quite difficult. With each level, more letters will be offered, but more words will have to be found. Use hints if you have collected enough coins for passing the previous levels or for finding extra words. Get ready for this challenging puzzle and game of success.
